name: GrappleIt! - A Grappling Gun Game By Milo
name_original: GrappleIt! - A Grappling Gun Game By Milo
description:
"GrappleIt" is a porkour game based on grappling hook mechanic.

(Tip) Lower the resolution in settings for better performance.

As for download, if you are on Windows downloading an instaler (GrappleIt_1.0 Setup.exe) is recommended.
